name: Little Helpers
description:
Featured at the Swinburne booth at PAX Australia 2019!

Little Helpers is a top-down, couch co-op, emergency services simulation game; with a focus on ridiculous, hazardous humour and chaotic cooperation. This game requires 4 controllers to be played.

Please follow us on Twitter and check out our website!

Please note...

  • Little Helpers was created as a final year project at Swinburne University of Technology in Melbourne, Australia.
  • This game is NOT for sale in its current state.
  • Please DO NOT steal our game - all of us worked so hard and just want to show the game to the world! :)

If you would like to get into contact with anyone on the team, please send me an email and I will redirect you.

Have fun!
